credit_line: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
title: Sidewall
description: Arabesque design. Central motif of large bouqet of flowers in urn. Below and in front of this sits a ewer on a lambrequin. Rope swags and tassles suspended from rod which supports lambrequin.  Rose swag around lambrequin. Above the bouquet sits a cameo, with an urn on a balustrade against a pink background. The cameo is surrounded by a beaded framework. Printed in polychrome on a light blue-green ground.
name: Sidewall
